meta.description: Maximize annual income from purchasing properties within budget constraints.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Decision to purchase each property (1 if purchased, 0 otherwise)

objective.name: max_annual_income
objective.expr: sum(income[p] * x[p] for p in PROPERTIES)
objective.description: Maximize total annual income from purchased properties

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(cost[p] * x[p] for p in PROPERTIES)
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased properties must not exceed budget

constraints.name: property_3_4_exclusion
constraints.description: Cannot purchase both Property 3 and Property 4
